## About This Repository

This repository powers the Bitris AI status page using automated monitoring workflows. Service health checks run every 5 minutes with historical data tracked and visualized.

### Monitored Services

- **Bitris AI Platform** - Core AI services and API endpoints
- **Voice Services** - Real-time voice synthesis and audio processing

### Data Retention

- Uptime checks: Every 5 minutes
- Response time logs: Every 6 hours
- Historical graphs: Updated daily
- All data committed to this repository for full transparency
